title: Storyshots
summary: Storyshots takes screenshots of a website's components before and after a change to avoid unintended breaks in the website.
long_summary: Storyshots does visual regression testing by taking screenshots of a website's components before and after a change in order to avoid unintended breaks in the website.

gallery.alt: A list of visual regression tests that have just run.
gallery.caption: Looks like every test passed!

gallery.alt: Side-by-side comparison of two screenshots of a button, before and after being edited.
gallery.caption: VS Code lets you compare screenshots
